{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3606571,"name":"Eric","username":"frypan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/frypan/{size}/217370_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-28T22:49:26.723Z","cooked":"

Hi all,

We are going through our shop and have these motors and other bits from old robots that we don’t need any longer. All of them are brushed motors that andymark sells for around 40 bucks. Obviously you would be paying for shipping. We are in Massachusetts.

If anything interests you let me know and I will try to get you details.

andymark.com

2.5 in. CIM Motor

2.5" CIM Motor am-0255

IMG_17961920×2560 1.08 MB

IMG_17971920×2560 1.12 MB

IMG_17981920×2560 455 KB

IMG_17991920×1440 270 KB

Regards,
Eric
